languages.text: "Если мои подсчеты, с учетом перемещений в варпе, верны, мне исполнилось тридцать четыре полтора месяца назад". {n}Повисает пауза. Вы не можете до конца понять, шутит ли стоящий перед вами старик, но на его лице нет ни намека на улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Если мои подсчеты, с учетом перемещений в варпе, верны, мне исполнилось тридцать четыре полтора месяца назад". {n}Повисает неловкая пауза. Вы не можете до конца понять, шутит ли стоящий перед вами старик, но на его лице нет ни намека на улыбку.{/n}

languages.text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если мои подсчеты, с учетом перемещений в варпе, верны, мне исполнилось тридцать четыре полтора месяца назад". {n}Повисает пауза. Вы не можете до конца понять, шутит ли стоящий перед вами старик, но на его лице нет ни намека на улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If my calculations, which factor in our movements through the warp, are correct, I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There's a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there isn't the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

"If my calculations, which factor in our movements through the warp, are correct, I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There's a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there isn't the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

"If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

"If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

languages.text: «Si mis cálculos son correctos, contando con nuestros movimientos por la disformidad, cumplí treinta y cuatro años hace mes y medio». {n}Hace una pausa. Quieres creer que el anciano está bromeando, pero no atisbas el menor rastro de una sonrisa en su cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si mis cálculos son correctos, contando con nuestros movimientos por la disformidad, cumplí treinta y cuatro años hace mes y medio». {n}Hace una pausa. Quieres creer que el anciano está bromeando, pero no atisbas el menor rastro de una sonrisa en su cara.{/n}

languages.text: 「私の計算が正しければ、ワープ中の移動を考慮して、1カ月半前に34歳になったことになる」{n}ピタリと固まる。目の前の老人が冗談を言っているのかどうか判断できないが、その顔はくすりとも笑っていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の計算が正しければ、ワープ中の移動を考慮して、1カ月半前に34歳になったことになる」{n}ピタリと固まる。目の前の老人が冗談を言っているのかどうか判断できないが、その顔はくすりとも笑っていない。{/n}

languages.text: “如果我的计算没错，把亚空间的旅途也考虑在内的话，那我应该是一个半月前刚满三十四岁。”{n}他的话停了下来。你无法确定眼前的老人是不是在和你开玩笑，但他的脸上没有一丝笑意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如果我的计算没错，把亚空间的旅途也考虑在内的话，那我应该是一个半月前刚满三十四岁。”{n}他的话停了下来。你无法确定眼前的老人是不是在和你开玩笑，但他的脸上没有一丝笑意。{/n}

languages.text: "Wenn meine Berechnungen stimmen, unsere Reisen durch den Warp berücksichtigt, bin ich vor anderthalb Monaten 34 geworden." {n}Er hält kurz inne. Du kannst nicht recht entscheiden, ob der alte Mann vor dir zu scherzen beliebt, doch auf seinem Gesicht ist nicht der leiseste Anflug eines Lächelns zu sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn meine Berechnungen stimmen, unsere Reisen durch den Warp berücksichtigt, bin ich vor anderthalb Monaten 34 geworden." {n}Er hält kurz inne. Du kannst nicht recht entscheiden, ob der alte Mann vor dir zu scherzen beliebt, doch auf seinem Gesicht ist nicht der leiseste Anflug eines Lächelns zu sehen.{/n}

languages.text: « Si mes calculs sont exacts, en tenant compte de nos déplacements à travers le Warp, j'ai fêté mes trente-quatre ans il y a un mois et demi de cela. » {n}Vous restez sans voix l'espace de quelques instants. Vous vous demandez s'il s'agit d'une plaisanterie, mais le vieillard qui se tient devant vous semble on ne peut plus sérieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si mes calculs sont exacts, en tenant compte de nos déplacements à travers le Warp, j'ai fêté mes trente-quatre ans il y a un mois et demi de cela. » {n}Vous restez sans voix l'espace de quelques instants. Vous vous demandez s'il s'agit d'une plaisanterie, mais le vieillard qui se tient devant vous semble on ne peut plus sérieux.{/n}

languages.text: "Öteboyuttaki hareketlerimizi göz önünde bulundurarak yaptığım hesaplarım doğruysa bir buçuk ay önce kırk dört yaşıma bastım." {n}Duraksıyor. Önünde duran ihtiyar adamın şaka yapıp yapmadığını kestiremiyorsun. Ancak yüzünde en ufak bir gülümseme emaresi bile görünmüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If my calculations are correct, having factored in our movements through the warp, then I turned thirty-four a month and a half ago." {n}There is a pause. You can't quite decide if the old man in front of you is joking, but there is not the slightest hint of a smile on his face.{/n}
